column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Five Chinese nationals who threw chairs and tables at a shop were searched for and detained by police forces in Boeung Keng Kang Police Department on the afternoon
column5: 2020. The Chinese are being questioned at the Beung Keng Kang Police Inspectorate.------Lieutenant Colonel Seth Piseth
column6: Inspector of Boeung Keng Kang Police
column7: told the media that Boeng Keng Kang I police
column8: arrested the 5 Chinese nationals at in Sangkat Boeng Keng Kang I
column10: Phnom Penh.------The destruction of property took place at about 2 am
column13: at a restaurant located on Monivong Boulevard in Boeung Keng Kang.------The reason for the destruction of the property was because of a dispute with a diner nearby. ------POST NEWS------*There are videos that have been circulating on social media the past few days of the incident.
